text: Dr Chang and clinic staffs always provide exceptional care during my mum's monthly visit. He was attentive, thorough, and made sure my mum understood her treatment options. Highly recommend!Truly kind folks. Always putting patient as the first priority. Very accomondating to our demanding request at time. A big thank you.

Exceptional service rendered by a Clinic you donâ€™t see very often. Very helpful and knowledgeable staff that will go to the extra mile to assist. Brought my staff here to reinstate his vaccination records but faced some hiccups, the staffs at the front desk were very professional and efficient in exercising their duties

It's always a pleasure to visit this clinic even when one isn't feeling well. The staff are very kind, helpful n know their work. Mrs Chang is also very calm n unfazed- Dr Chang takes the time to check n explain my condition n often goes the extra mile in his care n concern.
Highly recommend a visit.

I have known them since school. The husband and wife are experienced and trustworthy doctors in their fields. I've always appreciated their honest conversations and professional advice. Most importantly, they adhere to strong ethical practices. They are kind and respectful doctors in our neighbourhood.

Telephone was closed and unable to accept any appointments, and queue was at least an hour long upon arrival. Will never visit again- Singaporean clinics are state of the art masters in wasting your time.
